text: Joseph Bolangi Egwanga Ediba Tasame (29 December 1937 – 1 July 2019) was a Democratic Republic of the Congo Roman Catholic bishop. Bolangi Egwanga Ediba Tasame was born in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and was ordained to the priesthood in 1966. He served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Budjala from 1974 until 2009.Diocese of Bujala ==Notes== Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joseph Bolangi Egwanga Ediba Tasame
